alert.note: Alert for Bourbon; Crawford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 02 at 1:29PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN BOURBON...EASTERN CRAWFORD...WESTERN BARTON AND SOUTHWESTERN VERNON COUNTIES... At 128 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Frontenac, or near Pittsburg, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Pittsburg, Prairie State Park, Frontenac, Arma, Liberal, Sheldon, Mulberry, Nashville, Mindenmines, Franklin, Arcadia, Bronaugh, Lamar Heights, Irwin, Burgess, Croweburg, Yale, Hannon, Oakton and Iantha. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 67 and 80. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
